name: test.server
way: This method was created just to test how API works & get server's time. If param `require_test` will be set fields `int_value` and `str_value` will be required.

request.name: require_test
request.info: Trigger for testing 102 error. If it was set, `int_value` and `str_value` will be required

request.name: int_value
request.info: Integer, that will be returned back if it was set

request.name: str_value
request.info: String, that will be returned back if it was set

request.name: randoms
request.info: If it was set, API returns specified amount of randoms between 1000 and 9999

answer.name: randoms
answer.info: Specified amount of randoms between 1000 and 9999. Max amount - 15 nums
